function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adequate training and education for healthcare teams on dealing with COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of infection spread and improper use of PPE","Mitigation":"Provide intensive training and education programs for medical team on COVID-19 management and PPE usage","Technologies":"Online training platforms, webinars, and virtual simulation tools","People":"Healthcare teams, nurses, physicians, and other hospital workers","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control unit"},{"Description":"Inadequate isolation facilities and organizational support in hospitals","Impact":"Risk of cross-contamination and improper isolation of suspected patients","Mitigation":"Allocate isolation rooms for suspected patients, separate isolation areas from administrative offices, provide organizational support for triage and isolation","Technologies":"Facility planning software, architectural design tools, and organizational support systems","People":"Hospital managers, infection control unit, healthcare teams","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control unit"}]}
